slideInfo.title: What will you learn when studying nonfiction?

pButton.Name: Engage
pButton.popInfo: You will learn to engage the world around you.

pButton.Name: Validate
pButton.popInfo: You will learn to discern between valid and invalid arguments.

pButton.Name: Respond
pButton.popInfo: You will learn to move beyond a <font face='lc-Bold' size='14'>visceral</font> (immediate and emotional) response toward a reasoned, thoughtful consideration and retort (reply).

pButton.Name: Communicate
pButton.popInfo: You will learn to communicate your response with clarity and impact.
